00032 PerspectiveProjection::PerspectiveProjection()
00033 {
00034         set(640,480,1000,1000,320,240,0);
00035 }

00037 PerspectiveProjection::PerspectiveProjection(int w, int h, double f, double g, double cx, double cy, double s)
00038 {
00039         set(w,h,f,g,cx,cy,s);
00040 }
00041 
00042 void PerspectiveProjection::set(int w, int h, double f, double g, double cx, double cy, double s)
00043 {
00044         this->width = w;
00045         this->height = h;
00046         this->f = f;
00047         this->g = g;
00048         this->cx = cx;
00049         this->cy = cy;
00050         this->s = s;
00051         distortion = 0;
00052 
00053         nearPlane = f/16;
00054         farPlane = f*16;
00055         cmpEyeToImageMat();
00056 }
00057 
00063 bool PerspectiveProjection::setPlanes(double nearPlane, double farPlane)
00064 {
00065         if ((nearPlane > 0) && (nearPlane < farPlane)) {
00066                 this->nearPlane = nearPlane;
00067                 this->farPlane = farPlane;
00068                 return true;
00069         }
00070         return false;
00071 }

00073 
00078 void PerspectiveProjection::eyeToImage(const double eye[3], double uv[2]) const
00079 {
00080         uv[0] = (f * eye[0] + s * eye[1]) / eye[2] + cx;
00081         uv[1] = (g * eye[1]) / eye[2] + cy;
00082 }
00083 
00088 void PerspectiveProjection::imageToEye(double u, double v, double eye[3], double w) const
00089 {
00090         if (w==0) w = nearPlane;
00091 
00092         eye[1] = (v - cy)*(f/g);
00093         eye[0] = (u - cx - s*eye[1]);
00094         eye[2] = f;
00095 
00096         //double l = this->nearPlane / sqrt(eye[0]*eye[0] + eye[1]*eye[1] + eye[2]*eye[2]);
00097         double l = w / f;
00098         eye[0] *= l;
00099         eye[1] *= l;
00100         eye[2] *= l;
00101 }
00102 
00103 void PerspectiveProjection::imageToEye(const double uv[2], double eye[3], double w) const
00104 {
00105         imageToEye(uv[0], uv[1], eye, w);
00106 }

00118 void PerspectiveProjection::setGlProjection() const 
00119 {
00120 #ifdef HAVE_GL
00121         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00122         glLoadIdentity();
00123 
00124         GLdouble m[16];
00125         for (int i=0; i<16; ++i) m[i]=0;
00126         double w = (double) width;
00127         double h = (double) height;
00128 
00129         double _near = this->nearPlane;
00130         double _far = this->farPlane;
00131 
00132         m[0 + 0*4] = 2*f/w;
00133         m[0 + 1*4] = 2*s/w;
00134         m[0 + 2*4] = (-2*cx/w +1);
00135         m[1 + 1*4] = 2*g/h;
00136         m[1 + 2*4] = (-2*cy/h +1);
00137         m[2 + 2*4] = -(_far+_near)/(_far-_near);
00138         m[2 + 3*4] = -2*_far*_near/(_far-_near);
00139         m[3 + 2*4] = -1;
00140 
00141         glLoadMatrixd(m);
00142 #else
00143         cerr << "camera.cpp was not compiled with OpenGL support.\n";
00144 #endif
00145 }
00146 
00147 void PerspectiveProjection::cmpEyeToImageMat()
00148 {
00149         eyeToImageMat.m[0][0] = f;
00150         eyeToImageMat.m[1][0] = 0;
00151         eyeToImageMat.m[2][0] = 0;
00152         eyeToImageMat.m[0][1] = s;
00153         eyeToImageMat.m[1][1] = g;
00154         eyeToImageMat.m[2][1] = 0;
00155         eyeToImageMat.m[0][2] = cx;
00156         eyeToImageMat.m[1][2] = cy;
00157         eyeToImageMat.m[2][2] = 1;
00158 }
00159 
00162 void PerspectiveProjection::flip()
00163 {
00164         g= -g;
00165         cy = height -1 -cy;
00166         cmpEyeToImageMat();
00167 }
00168 
00169 bool PerspectiveProjection::getUndistortMap(CvMat *xmap, CvMat *ymap)
00170 {
00171         if (distortion == 0) return false;
00172 
00173         for (int y=0; y<xmap->height; y++) {
00174                 for (int x=0; x<ymap->height; y++) {
00175                         float image[2], distor[2];
00176 
00177                         image[0] = (x - (cx))/f;
00178                         image[1] = (y - (cy))/g;
00179 
00180                         distor[0] = image[0] - distortion * image[0] * (image[0]*image[0]+image[1]*image[1]);
00181                         distor[1] = image[1] - distortion * image[1] * (image[0]*image[0]+image[1]*image[1]);
00182 
00183 
00184                         cvSetReal2D(xmap, y, x, distor[0]*f + cx);
00185                         cvSetReal2D(ymap, y, x, distor[1]*g + cy);
00186                 }
00187         }
00188         return true;
00189 }

00192 {
00193         clearExternalParams();
00194         translate(0,0,-f);

00197 void PerspectiveCamera::worldToImage(const Vec3 &p, Vec3 &uvw) const
00198 {
00199         uvw.setMul(worldToImageMat, p);
00200         uvw.v[0] /= uvw.v[2];
00201         uvw.v[1] /= uvw.v[2];
00202 }
00203 
00204 void PerspectiveCamera::worldToImage(const double p[3], double uvw[3]) const
00205 {
00206         worldToImage(*((Vec3 *)p), *((Vec3 *)uvw));
00207 }

00209 void PerspectiveCamera::worldToEye(const Vec3 &src, Vec3 &dst) const
00210 {
00211         dst.setMul(worldToEyeMat, src);
00212 }
00213 
00214 void PerspectiveCamera::worldToEye(const double src[3], double dst[3]) const
00215 {
00216         ((Vec3 *)dst)->setMul(worldToEyeMat, *((Vec3 *)src));
00217 }

00219 void PerspectiveCamera::setGlModelView() const
00220 {
00221 #ifdef HAVE_GL
00222         GLdouble m[16];
00223 
00224         for (int i=0; i<3; ++i) 
00225                 for (int j=0;j<4; ++j) 
00226                         m[i+j*4] = worldToEyeMat.m[i][j];
00227         m[3+0*4] = m[3+1*4] = m[3+2*4] = 0;
00228         m[3+3*4]=1;
00229         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00230         glLoadIdentity();
00231         glScalef(1,1,-1);
00232         glMultMatrixd(m);
00233 #else
00234         cerr << "camera.cpp was not compiled with OpenGL support.\n";
00235 #endif
00236 }

00238 void PerspectiveCamera::setByTarget(const Vec3 pos, const Vec3 target, double roll)
00239 {
00240         Vec3 x,y,z;
00241 
00242         // TODO: is this correct ?
00243         Vec3 up(sin(roll), cos(roll), 0);
00244 
00245         z.setSub(target, pos);
00246         z.normalize();
00247         
00248         x.setCross(z,up);
00249         y.setCross(x,z);
00250 
00251         for (int i=0; i<3; i++) {
00252                 worldToEyeMat.m[0][i] = x[i];
00253                 worldToEyeMat.m[1][i] = y[i];
00254                 worldToEyeMat.m[2][i] = z[i];
00255         }
00256 
00257         for (int i=0; i<3; ++i) {
00258                 worldToEyeMat.m[i][3] = -worldToEyeMat.m[i][0]*pos[0]
00259                         - worldToEyeMat.m[i][1]*pos[1]
00260                         - worldToEyeMat.m[i][2]*pos[2];
00261         }
00262         cmpWorldToImageMat();
00263 }
00264 
00265 static void get3x3MulWithTransposed(const double m[3][4], double mmt[3][3])
00266 {
00267         double t7 = m[0][0]*m[0][0];
00268         double t8 = m[0][1]*m[0][1];
00269         double t9 = m[0][2]*m[0][2];
00270         double t14 = m[0][0]*m[1][0]+m[0][1]*m[1][1]+m[0][2]*m[1][2];
00271         double t18 = m[0][0]*m[2][0]+m[0][1]*m[2][1]+m[0][2]*m[2][2];
00272         double t19 = m[1][0]*m[1][0];
00273         double t20 = m[1][1]*m[1][1];
00274         double t21 = m[1][2]*m[1][2];
00275         double t26 = m[1][0]*m[2][0]+m[1][1]*m[2][1]+m[1][2]*m[2][2];
00276         double t27 = m[2][0]*m[2][0];
00277         double t28 = m[2][1]*m[2][1];
00278         double t29 = m[2][2]*m[2][2];
00279         mmt[0][0] = t7+t8+t9;
00280         mmt[0][1] = t14;
00281         mmt[0][2] = t18;
00282         mmt[1][0] = t14;
00283         mmt[1][1] = t19+t20+t21;
00284         mmt[1][2] = t26;
00285         mmt[2][0] = t18;
00286         mmt[2][1] = t26;
00287         mmt[2][2] = t27+t28+t29;
00288 }
00289 
00295 void PerspectiveCamera::loadTdir(const double _tdir[3][4], int w, int h)
00296 {
00297         this->width=w;
00298         this->height=h;
00299         double tdir[3][4];
00300 
00301         double ppt[3][3];
00302 
00303         double l = sqrt(_tdir[2][0]*_tdir[2][0]
00304                         + _tdir[2][1]*_tdir[2][1]
00305                         + _tdir[2][2]*_tdir[2][2]);
00306         for (int i=0; i<3; ++i)
00307                 for (int j=0;j<4; ++j)
00308                         tdir[i][j] = _tdir[i][j]/l;
00309 
00310         get3x3MulWithTransposed(tdir, ppt);
00311 
00312         worldToEyeMat.m[2][0] = tdir[2][0];
00313         worldToEyeMat.m[2][1] = tdir[2][1];
00314         worldToEyeMat.m[2][2] = tdir[2][2];
00315         worldToEyeMat.m[2][3] = tdir[2][3];
00316 
00317         cx = ppt[2][0];
00318         cy = ppt[2][1];
00319 
00320         // sign is unkown!
00321         g = sqrt(ppt[1][1]-cy*cy);
00322 
00323         s = (ppt[1][0]-cx*cy)/g;
00324 
00325         // sign is also unknown!
00326         f = sqrt(ppt[0][0]-cx*cx-s*s);
00327 
00328         worldToEyeMat.m[1][0] = (tdir[1][0] - cy*worldToEyeMat.m[2][0])/g;
00329         worldToEyeMat.m[0][0] = (tdir[0][0] - s*worldToEyeMat.m[1][0] - cx*worldToEyeMat.m[2][0])/f; 
00330 
00331         worldToEyeMat.m[1][1] = (tdir[1][1] - cy*worldToEyeMat.m[2][1])/g;
00332         worldToEyeMat.m[0][1] = (tdir[0][1] - s*worldToEyeMat.m[1][1] - cx*worldToEyeMat.m[2][1])/f; 
00333 
00334         worldToEyeMat.m[1][2] = (tdir[1][2] - cy*worldToEyeMat.m[2][2])/g;
00335         worldToEyeMat.m[0][2] = (tdir[0][2] - s*worldToEyeMat.m[1][2] - cx*worldToEyeMat.m[2][2])/f; 
00336 
00337         worldToEyeMat.m[1][3] = (tdir[1][3] - cy*worldToEyeMat.m[2][3])/g;
00338         worldToEyeMat.m[0][3] = (tdir[0][3] - s*worldToEyeMat.m[1][3] - cx*worldToEyeMat.m[2][3])/f;
00339 
00340         if (worldToEyeMat.det() < 0) {
00341                 g=-g;
00342                 for (int i=0;i<4;++i) worldToEyeMat.m[1][i] = -worldToEyeMat.m[1][i];
00343         }
00344 
00345         cmpEyeToImageMat();
00346         eyeToWorldMat.setInverseByTranspose(worldToEyeMat);
00347         memcpy(&worldToImageMat, tdir, sizeof(worldToImageMat));
00348 
00349 }
00350 
00356 bool PerspectiveCamera::loadTdir(const char *tdirFile, int w, int h)
00357 {
00358         ifstream file;
00359         file.open(tdirFile);
00360 
00361         if (!file.good()) return false;
00362         double tdir[3][4];
00363 
00364         for (int j=0; j<3; ++j) 
00365                 for (int i=0; i<4; ++i) 
00366                         file >> tdir[j][i];
00367         char line[256];
00368         while (file.getline(line,256)) {
00369                 if (memcmp(line, "distortion:", 11)==0) {
00370                         double d;
00371                         if (sscanf(line+11, "%lf", &d)==1) {
00372                                 distortion = d;
00373                                 printf("Camera distortion: %f\n", d);
00374                         }
00375                 } else if (memcmp(line, "width:", 6)==0) {
00376                         int nw;
00377                         if (sscanf(line+6, "%d", &nw)==1) {
00378                                 w = nw;
00379                         }
00380                 } else if (memcmp(line, "height:", 7)==0) {
00381                         int nh;
00382                         if (sscanf(line+7, "%d", &nh)==1) {
00383                                 h = nh;
00384                         }
00385                 } else if (memcmp(line, "near:", 5)==0) {
00386                         double d;
00387                         if (sscanf(line+5, "%lf", &d)==1) {
00388                                 nearPlane = d;
00389                                 printf("Near clipping plane: %f\n", d);
00390                         }
00391                 } else if (memcmp(line, "far:", 4)==0) {
00392                         double d;
00393                         if (sscanf(line+4, "%lf", &d)==1) {
00394                                 farPlane = d;
00395                                 printf("Near clipping plane: %f\n", d);
00396                         }
00397                 }
00398         }
00399         file.close();
00400         loadTdir(tdir, w,h);
00401 
00402         // look for a .plane file.
00403         if (strlen(tdirFile) > 5) {
00404                 char fn[512];
00405                 strncpy(fn, tdirFile, 511);
00406                 strcpy(fn + strlen(fn) - strlen(".tdir"), ".plane");
00407                 file.open(fn);
00408 
00409                 if (file.good()) {
00410                         double d,n=nearPlane,f=farPlane;
00411                         for (int i=0; i<4; ++i)
00412                                 file >> d;
00413                         if (file.good())  file >> n;
00414                         if (file.good()) file >> f;
00415 
00416                         file.close();
00417                         if (setPlanes(n,f))
00418                                 std::cout << "Reading clipping planes from " << fn 
00419                                         << ": near=" << n 
00420                                         << " far=" << f << endl;
00421                         else
00422                                 std::cerr << "Troubles loading " << fn << "!\n";
00423                 }
00424         }
00425         return true;
00426 }
00427 
00428 struct GuessMode {
00429         int w, h;
00430 };
00431 static double diag(double x, double y)
00432 {
00433         return sqrt(x*x+y*y);
00434 }
00435 
00436 static double diagDiff(const GuessMode &m, double dx, double dy)
00437 {
00438         double mdiag = diag(double(m.w), double(m.h));
00439         return fabs(double(mdiag - diag(2*dx,2*dy)));
00440 }
00441 
00442 
00450 bool PerspectiveCamera::loadTdir(const char *tdirFile)
00451 {
00452         if (!loadTdir(tdirFile,0,0)) return false;
00453 
00454         if ((width !=0) && (height !=0)) return true;
00455 
00456         static const GuessMode mode[] = {
00457                 { 640, 480 },
00458                 { 320, 240 },
00459                 { 720, 576 },
00460                 { 360, 288 },
00461                 { 800, 600 },
00462                 { 1024, 768},
00463                 { 512, 384},
00464                 { 1280, 1024},
00465                 { -1, -1}
00466         };
00467 
00468         int best=0;
00469         double bestDelta = diagDiff(mode[0], cx, cy);   
00470         for (int i=1; mode[i].w != -1; ++i) {
00471                 double delta = diagDiff(mode[i], cx, cy);
00472                 if (delta < bestDelta) {
00473                         best = i;
00474                         bestDelta = delta;
00475                 }
00476         }
00477         width = mode[best].w;
00478         height = mode[best].h;
00479 
00480         return true;
00481 }

00484 void PerspectiveCamera::clearExternalParams()
00485 {
00486         worldToEyeMat.setIdentity();
00487         cmpWorldToImageMat();
00488 }
00489 
00490 void PerspectiveCamera::cmpWorldToImageMat()
00491 {
00492         worldToImageMat.setMul(eyeToImageMat, worldToEyeMat);
00493         eyeToWorldMat.setInverseByTranspose(worldToEyeMat);
00494 }
00495 
00496 void PerspectiveCamera::eyeToWorld(const Vec3 &uvw, Vec3 &w) const
00497 {
00498         w.setMul(eyeToWorldMat, uvw);
00499 }
00500 
00501 void PerspectiveCamera::imageToWorld(double u, double v, Vec3 &w, double depth) const
00502 {
00503         Vec3 uvw;
00504         imageToEye(u,v, uvw.v, depth);
00505         eyeToWorld(uvw, w);
00506 }

00508 void PerspectiveCamera::translate(double dx, double dy, double dz) 
00509 {
00510         worldToEyeMat.m[0][3] -= dx;
00511         worldToEyeMat.m[1][3] -= dy;
00512         worldToEyeMat.m[2][3] -= dz;
00513         cmpWorldToImageMat();
00514 }
00515 
00516 void PerspectiveCamera::setWorldToEyeMat(const Mat3x4 &m)
00517 {
00518         worldToEyeMat = m;
00519         cmpWorldToImageMat();
00520 }

00522 bool PerspectiveCamera::saveTdir(const char *file)
00523 {
00524         ofstream f(file);
00525 
00526         if (!f.good()) return false;
00527 
00528         for (int l=0; l<3; l++) {
00529                 for (int c=0; c<4; c++) {
00530                         f << worldToImageMat.m[l][c] << " ";
00531                 }
00532                 f << "\n";
00533         }
00534         f << "width: " << width << endl;
00535         f << "height: " << height << endl;
00536         f << "distortion: " << distortion << endl;
00537         f << "near: " << nearPlane << endl;
00538         f << "far: " << farPlane << endl;
00539         return true;
00540 }

00542 ostream& operator << (ostream& os, const PerspectiveProjection &cam)
00543 {
00544         os << "fx=" << cam.f
00545                 << ", fy="<< cam.g
00546                 << ", cx="<< cam.cx
00547                 << ", cy="<< cam.cy
00548                 << ", s="<< cam.s
00549                 << ", near="<< cam.nearPlane
00550                 << ", far="<< cam.farPlane
00551                 << ", width="<<cam.width
00552                 << ", height="<<cam.height;
00553         return os;
00554 }
